page.title: 16Buntingford - Newspapers
page.content:
The Buntingford area is served by two newspapers, The Hertfordshire Mercury and the Royston Crow (properly called the Herts and Cambs Reporter and Royston Crow). Neither is truly local to Buntingford, as the Mercury covers a very wide area, hiding Buntingford amongst many other villages, whilst many Buntingford people themselves do not read the"Crow" because they feel remote from Royston!
In recent years, a new publication has emerged, especially for Buntingford people. It is called "The Buntingford Journal" and is printed monthly. The journal is quite small, more a magazine than a paper, but it does give very good coverage to local events. Most local people read it.
